segments.text: I used to be down on the sales people until I saw her in action .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most salespeople seem like half-brains . Zina's definitely an exception .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'd better get back to work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I'm not too worried about Vince , but I'd hate to face Zina if we don't deliver ...
segments.speaker: S1
